text: Nandi Yellaiah (1 July 1942 - 8 August 2020) was an Indian politician. He was a member of the Indian National Congress party. From 2014 to 2019, he was member of Parliament of India from Nagarkurnool in the Lok Sabha. He was born in Hyderabad, India. Yellaiah died on 8 August 2020 at a Hyderabad hospital from COVID-19, aged 78.Senior Congress leader Nandi Yellaiah dies of COVID-19 ==References== Category:Politicians from Telangana Category:1942 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Hyderabad Category:Members of the Lok Sabha
title: Nandi Yellaiah
